refnamediv.refpurpose: print the date of Easter in one or more years

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: easter prints the date(s) of Easter in one or more years. year can be negative or positive, and is a Proleptic Gregorian year number.

refsection.title: History
refsection.para: easter was originally part of DanielJ.Bernstein's libtai toolset in 1999.

refsection.title: Author
refsection.para: Original code and documentation by DanielJ.Bernstein. Documentation modernizations by Jonathande Boyne Pollard.
